pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clustering of Variables Around Latent Variables // Functions for the clustering of variables around Latent Variables, for 2-way or 3-way data. Each cluster of variables, which may be defined as a local or directional cluster, is associated with a latent variable. External variables measured on the same observations or/and additional information on the variables can be taken into account. A "noise" cluster or sparse latent variables can also be defined.
